name: Xerophyllum

Rectum: Difficult, soft stools, with much straining
Difficulty of retaining; dribbling when walking
Eyes: Painful, as of sand, smarting; difficult to focus for close work
Respiratory: Posterior nares raw; discharge thick, yellow mucus
Stomach: Eructations sour; offensive, an hour after luncheons and dinner
Female: Increased sexual desire, with ovarian and uterine pains and leucorrhoea
Mind: Dull, cannot concentrate mind for study; forgets names; WRITES LAST LETTERS OF WORDS FIRST; misspells common words
Back: Feels hot from sacrum to scapulae
Nose: Stuffed; tightness at bridge of nose; acute nasal catarrh
Head: Feels full, stuffed up, pain across forehead and above eyes
Great pressure at root of nose
Bewildered
Loss of consciousness
Pulsating headache
Skin: Erythema, with vesication and intense itching, stinging, and burning
Skin rough and cracked; feels like leather
Inguinal glands and behind knees swollen
Abdomen: In morning rumbling in bowels, with desire for stool

details: Should prove curative in eczematous conditions, poison-oak, early typhoid states, etc.Dysmenorrhoea and skin symptoms.
